translations: 洗手间；厕所；盥洗室（等于 lavatory）

sentences.sentence: The black-and-white revenge tale "The Woman Who Left" by Filipino director Lav Diaz won the Golden Lion prize for best picture last Saturday at the Venice Film Festival.
sentences.translation: 当地时间上周六，由菲律宾导演拉夫·达兹执导的复仇题材黑白片《离开的女人》获得威尼斯电影节最佳影片金狮奖。
